trans-unit.source: Sets the transparency of a window.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the transparency of a window.

target.mrk: Sets the transparency of a window.

trans-unit.source: The title/hWnd/class of the window to change. See Title special definition.

seg-source.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to change.

target.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to change.

trans-unit.source: The text of the window to change. See Text special definition.

seg-source.mrk: The text of the window to change.

target.mrk: The text of the window to change.

trans-unit.source: A number in the range 0 - 255. The lower the number, the more transparent the window will become. 255 = Solid, 0 = Invisible.

seg-source.mrk: The lower the number, the more transparent the window will become.

target.mrk: The lower the number, the more transparent the window will become.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero if no supported on the OS.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero if no supported on the OS.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero if no supported on the OS.

trans-unit.source: Screen color must be greater or equal to 16-bit.

seg-source.mrk: Screen color must be greater or equal to 16-bit.

target.mrk: Screen color must be greater or equal to 16-bit.

trans-unit.source: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

seg-source.mrk: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

target.mrk: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

trans-unit.source: Set the transparency of the Notepad window to 170.

seg-source.mrk: Set the transparency of the Notepad window to 170.

target.mrk: Set the transparency of the Notepad window to 170.

trans-unit.source: Wait for 2 seconds to display the Notepad window.

seg-source.mrk: Wait for 2 seconds to display the Notepad window.

target.mrk: Wait for 2 seconds to display the Notepad window.

trans-unit.source: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.

target.mrk: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinWait.
